name: Enter the Drunkgeon
description:
Enter the Drunkgeon is a management/defense game where you take the role of Jonás, the barmaster.

Jonás own a small bar outside time and space. It's a key location for the evil alien croquettes. Unfortunately, a certain day they decided to assault Jonás' place.

Jonás will have to rely in his loyal customers, giving them beer to keep them fighting while defending against hordes of croquettes using his trusted shotgun.

Hints:
Survive 5 minutes to win the assault
Press RB or left mouse button to shoot
Press X or R to reload
Press RT/LT or 1/3 to rotate the camera
Press A or E to interact
Interact with the shelves behind the bar to get beer
While holding beer, interact with customers to get them drunk
Drunk customers can fight for you
If a customer ceases to be drunk, they'll faint
If a customer pees, they'll lose alcohol quicker
Drunk customers have less accuracy and move slower
Whenever a customer gets hit they lose alcohol
Press Back or H to disable hints
